resources.string: Looks like you\'re enjoying this app a lot!\nPlease take a minute to rate this app and help support to add more new features.
Looks like battery Optimization is ON. For detection, disable battery optimization for this application. \n\nClick here to goto battery settings!

Looks like battery Optimization is ON. For detection, disable battery optimization for this application. 
Click on Disable. (Make sure to be in the "all apps" list) Then find "Whats Track" app from the list and click. Select Don't Optimize. 

Disable Now!
In order to detect recent GPS usage apps. Please enable Storage Access!

Make sure battery Optimization is OFF. For detection, disable battery optimization for this application. \n\nClick here to goto battery settings if Android > M. For MI devices manually goto Security App too.
A freelance android developer\, developing applications that users long for, loves to do unique ones.\nGot any ideas or issues with the app? Email Me !
Welcome to the cleaner app!\nThe app is the best and powerful tool to clean received and sent media via WhatsApp.\nThe app can also recover deleted messages.

The app can recover deleted Whatsapp message. This feature requires Notification Listener Permission. Click to enable! You can also enable it later in the app. 

Note: 
Messages can be recovered only if it appears as notification. If it is muted, we won't be able to recover it!
The app also needs Location, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth permissions to monitor and notify. Please grant access if prompted, and you\'re all set.

To use Ringer Track(optional), DND Access is required.
Click Button and provide access now.
You can also enable it later in Settings.

(Only if purchased) We also require Email Access only to verify In-App purchases.
To display Recent GPS Access list (Available in donate version only), \nApp Usage Access is required!
* Initial release \n * More features coming soon \n
Looks like you\'re enjoying the app a lot!! Please take a minute to rate and help support to add more new features!
For the the app. to work you need to enable the Notification Listener Service. Enable it now?
Displays usage information folder-wise. Select any folder to view delete options.
List of 5 probable apps that have recently used GPS.\n(Donate Feature)
List of installed apps with Location Access Granted.\nTIP:Tap on the app to access its app info.
Thank you for downloading the app. Please Rate and Donate!
The setting will enable notifications to be permanent (or set to Ongoing), and cannot be swipe dismissed.
The setting controls which module to keep track OF and notify you.
The setting shows Miscellaneous setting options.
The setting controls the ringer mode needed to keep track OF.\nUser will be notified if the Ringer mode is changed to anything other than the user selected option.
The account chosen must exist in your device at all times for future verification. If you want to use the app in multiple devices, please install the app from the same account used for purchase!
Looks like you have purchased the App. Due to restrictions in Android you need to choose the account used for purchase manually.This is a onetime action only!
